sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The Israeli military says it's expanding its ground forces activity in the besieged Gaza Strip.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: In Gaza, the lives of tens of thousands of pregnant women are becoming harder by the day as essential aid runs out.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Satellite images show the extent of the destruction from Israeli shelling in Gaza, as the Israeli military reports its ground forces were expanding their activity in the Gaza Strip.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Earlier Israel has also accused Hamas of using hospitals for military purposes.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Hamas has turned hospitals into command and control centers and hideouts for Hamas terrorists and commanders.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Additionally, I can confirm that according to the intelligence we have in our hands, there is fuel in hospitals in Gaza.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: I repeat, there is fuel in hospitals in Gaza, and Hamas is using it for its terror infrastructures." The allegation was swiftly denied by Hamas.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The United Nations said earlier it had mechanisms in place to prevent aid from being diverted.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: On Friday, the UN General Assembly approved a non-binding resolution calling for a humanitarian truce in Gaza. Meanwhile, several rockets landing in Tel Aviv causing damage to a building where at least four people were injured.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: United Nations Population Fund says there are around 50,000 pregnant women in Gaza, 5,500 of whom are due to give birth by the end of next month.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: These women are facing extreme challenges as essential goods such as medicine and water 1500 منهم يجب أن يتنفرون في نهاية المنهج هذه المرأة تتعامل بأسرار أكثر كبيرة لأن الأموال الأساسية مثل المدينة والماء تصبح أصعب أن تجدها ويضعون فيها محافظات مستقلة في مدينة سابين لم تستطع سابين تسجيل ابنتها أو تحضيره In the midst of war, Sabine has also not been able to register her son or get him vaccinated.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Instead, she has only been able to give him a name, Abdullah.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Faced with a surge in migrants and asylum seekers, Bulgarian authorities say their border fence with Turkey is working to keep them out.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Sofia wants to join the passport-free Schengen area. Vienna, however, has blocked its inclusion. Due to an influx of refugees using the Western Balkan route, it also opposes Romania's accession.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Austria says every time that it has nothing against Romania or Bulgaria, but it opposes but the extension of the Schengen space is opposed, in the conditions in which, exactly in that same meeting, Croatia's adherence was approved.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: So the arguments are at least a bit off.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Slovenia meanwhile is extending a period of heightened security on its border with Croatia and Hungary.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The move comes after Italy announced more police checks on the border with Slovenia due to potential threats tied to the war in Gaza.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Newcastle and Italy midfielder Sandro Tonali has been banned from playing for 10 months and fined 20,000 euros.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The decision was made by the Italian Football Federation, which found he breached betting rules.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The 23-year-old must also undergo counselling for his gambling problem.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Part of that will include talking to young players about the dangers of betting.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Tonali will be off the field until August.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: He'll also miss out on the Euro 2024 next summer, should Italy qualify. There was a surprise exhibition for tourists at Paris' Louvre Museum as environmental activists scaled the site's iconic glass pyramid.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: They painted a section of the structure with orange liquid as part of a protest, calling for the government to make buildings more energy efficient.
